# SKProductDiscount.Type.subscription

**Case**

A constant indicating the discount type is a promotional offer.

## Declaration

```swift
case subscription
```

## Discussion

For more information about promotional offers, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/implementing-promotional-offers-in-your-app].

## Types of Offers

- **SKProductDiscount.Type.introductory**: A constant indicating the discount type is an introductory offer.
